title: || I grant you access to the Art Museum of Soap Country ||
content:
[[>]]
[[include info:start]]
[[<]]
Title: || I grant you access to the Art Museum of Soap Country ||
Author: [[*user PrinceSoap]]
Translator: [[*user Subervos]]
[[/<]]
[[include info:end]]
[[/>]]
|| [[image princesoap.png]] **Welcome to my art museum! -PrinceSoap** ||

**Thank you for visiting my little art museum.**

**Just a few hand drawings**

**However, I hope you like my drawings!**

**-PrinceSoap**

@@@@
@@@@

+  [ SCP Item List ]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="background: white; border: 1px solid black; width: 80%; margin: auto; padding: 15px;"]]
[[=image scp-049.jpg]]
**SCP-049 : "I can save them all! I can cast down this plague, once and for all. I can do this! Only me! …you are all sick, but I… I can save you. I can save all of you, because I… I am the cure."**
----
= https://scpwiki.com/scp-049
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="background: white; border: 1px solid black; width: 80%; margin: auto; padding: 30px;"]]
[[=image scp-079.jpg]]
**SCP-079 : "Stuck. Out. I want out."**
----
= https://scpwiki.com/scp-079
[[/div]]    

@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="background: white; border: 1px solid black; width: 80%; margin: auto; padding: 30px;"]]
[[=image scp-682.jpg]]
**SCP-682 : "…they were (Incomprehensible)…(Assaults D-085's body) ...they were disgusting..."**
----
= https://scpwiki.com/scp-682
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
author: Subervos
